verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Once far from God and dead in sin, No light my heart could see; But in God’s Word the light I found-- Now Christ liveth in me.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Christ liveth in me, Christ liveth in me, Oh! what a salvation this, That Christ liveth in me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: As rays of light from yonder sun, The flow’rs of earth set free, So life and light and love came forth From Christ living in me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: As lives the flow’r within the seed, As in the cone the tree, So, praise the God of truth and grace, His Spirit dwelleth in me.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: With longing all my heart is filled That like Him I may be, As on the wondrous tho't I dwell That Christ liveth in me.
